General.Name: Visa Steel Limited
General.Description: VISA Steel Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of iron and steel products in India. The company operates in two segments, Special Steel and Ferro Alloys segments. It offers high carbon ferro chrome for use in stainless steel and special steel manufacturing applications. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.

2.Name: Mr. Manoj  Kumar
2.Title: COO, Director for Kalinganagar & Whole-time Director
